"Katsuragi": "You must be the new ARKS from Aelio! I've heard rumors about you. You must be very skilled."
"The DOLLS of Stia are all formidable enemies. An ARKS of your calibre is more than welcome here."
"My name is Katsuragi, and in this vanguard unit, I handle technical support!"
"I've been supporting the battle effort by studying the structures and enemies that exist in Stia, but..."
"I've run into a bit of an issue. I'd like you to help me out with it."
"Would you be willing to hear me out on this?"
"Please collect data on the Regional Mag. The one in Stia's Fringes, if you would."
"Oh, I see... Well, let me know when you have some time; I'd appreciate it."
"Thanks so much for earlier! You really helped me out."
"If something else comes up, I hope you don't mind me calling on you. When that time comes, I'd love your help again."
"It's so good to see you! Actually, there's something I'd like to ask your help with again."
"It's just... This time might be a little dangerous, so I'm not saying you have to."
"Please collect data on the Recon Gigantix. All I need is for you to get close and confirm a visual."
"The targets' strengths are unknown. Please take utmost care out there."
"I seee... Well, if you change your mind, please let me know."
"Thanks to you, we were able to obtain a lot of valuable data."
"We'll definitely make good use of it in upcoming battles. The other troops would like to extend their thanks as well."
"If anything else comes up, I hope we can depend on you again. Safe travels!"
